title: 2018 Clip of MP Doctor Being Attacked Revived Amid Kolkata Protest
subtitle: Doctor Being Attacked in Madhya Pradesh Viral Video Fact Check: A video of a doctor being attacked presumably by the family members of a patient in Madhya Pradesh, even as police personnel are present, is viral on social media.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video of a doctor being attacked, presumably by a patient’s family, despite police personnel being present, has gone viral on social media. The CCTV video of the incident is being shared with the message that a doctor was attacked while the police was present on the spot.

The Quint received a query regarding the video on its WhatsApp number.
